description.value:
A non-elemental creature approaches within 20 feet

Effect All creatures within 20 feet must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:18] save; results are as if the hazard used its normal routine. The hazard then rolls initiative.

details.description: The wind grows fierce as a small planar fissure opens, blowing around leaves and creatures alike.
details.disable: @Check[type:arcana,nature,thievery|dc:15] (trained) two times to counter the planar energies.

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Quest #22: Friends in Need

details.routine:
(3 actions) On its turn each round, the wind begins blowing fiercely from a random direction. All creatures must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:15] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is moved 5 feet in the direction the wind is blowing.

Failure The creature is moved 10 feet in the direction the wind is blowing and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Critical Failure The creature is moved 10 feet in the direction the wind is blowing, is knocked prone, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.
